google.title: Learn German words & Grammar
google.description:
For beginners and advanced German learners. Learn vocabulary through Anki flashcards featuring over 15000 words, including A1, A2, and B1 Goethe word lists. Learn A1, A2, B1, B2, C1, C2 German words. Practice der, die, das with hints. Engage in various advanced grammar exercises covering cases, verb conjugations, prepositions, and more. Review German grammar through summary tables.

The app was formerly called Linguistic, it has been renamed to Linguico.

reviews.review: Pretty solid app for learning german
